TopicTitle: Unity Pro - Special Trial until 9th Feb, for everyone!

Articles.Content:
Hi guys, I've been a participant of the Global Game Jam (GGJ) last weekend, and we all got a special Unity Pro trial that lasts until 9th February. I thought that the licences are connected to the GGJ accounts, but Sarbian tried the link yesterday, and it's not connected. Anyone can take the licence.

Here is the link you should follow: https://unity3d.com/gamejams/ggj2014?utm_source=Twitter&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=ggj14

This GGJ trial is NOT connected to the 30-day trial that Unity normally offers, you can still use the official trial after 9th February.

And disclaimer for moderators: I hope I don't get punished for posting this, this is not a commercial, just a chance for everyone to try Unity Pro for a few more days. GGJ is officially supported by Unity. And KSP is already using the same software. And if you find this offensive, please tell me first!

Edited January 31, 2014 by nothke
